Actions.Text: REFERRED TO MENTAL HEALTH AND DEVELOPMENTAL DISABILITIES
REFERRED TO MENTAL HEALTH AND DEVELOPMENTAL DISABILITIES

Title: Relates to fees for services rendered to patients in state inpatient facilities pursuant to court orders
Summary: Provides for fees for services rendered to patients in state inpatient facilities pursuant to court orders to be paid by the county in which the court is located for the first thirty days.
LawCode: Amd ยง43.03, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to fees for services rendered to patients held in state inpatient facilities pursuant to court orders
